text: Letter Never Sent () is a 1960 Soviet adventure drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov.Что смотреть: новые сериалы для тех, кто уже заскучал на каникулахНЕОТПРАВЛЕННОЕ ПИСЬМО It stars Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Tatiana Samoilova, and Vasily Livanov. ==Actors== * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as Konstantin Fyodorovich Sabinin * Tatiana Samoilova as Tanya * Vasily Livanov as Andrei * Yevgeni Urbansky as Sergei Stepanovich * Galina Kozhakina as Vera == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1960 drama movies Category:1960 adventure movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: Letter Never Sent (movie)
